metadata.name: High Court Writ Petition
metadata.description: Writ petition template for filing before High Courts under Article 226/227 of the Constitution. Suitable for challenging administrative actions and seeking constitutional remedies.

required_fields.label: Petitioner Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the petitioner filing the writ

required_fields.label: Petitioner Address
required_fields.description: Complete address of the petitioner for service

required_fields.label: Respondent Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the respondent authority
required_fields.example: State of Uttar Pradesh through Principal Secretary, Home Department

required_fields.label: Respondent Address
required_fields.description: Complete address of the respondent for service

required_fields.label: Cause of Action
required_fields.description: Facts giving rise to the writ petition and when the cause arose
required_fields.example: The impugned order dated 15.12.2023 terminating the petitioner's services is illegal and violative of principles of natural justice.

required_fields.label: Relief Sought
required_fields.description: Specific writs and reliefs being sought from the Court
required_fields.example: a) Issue writ of certiorari quashing the impugned order; b) Issue writ of mandamus for reinstatement with back wages

required_fields.label: Jurisdiction Ground
required_fields.description: Legal basis for the High Court's writ jurisdiction
required_fields.example: Article 226 of the Constitution of India as the cause of action arose within the territorial jurisdiction of this Hon'ble Court

optional_fields.label: Interim Relief
optional_fields.description: Any interim stay or relief sought pending final disposal
optional_fields.example: Stay of the impugned order and continuation in service pending disposal of the writ petition

optional_fields.label: Court Fee Details
optional_fields.description: Details of court fee stamps affixed on the petition
optional_fields.example: Court fee of Rs. 300/- as per Schedule

template_content:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF _______________
AT _______________

[CIVIL/SERVICE/CRIMINAL] WRIT JURISDICTION

WRIT PETITION NO. _____ OF _____

IN THE MATTER OF:

{petitioner_name}
{petitioner_address}
... Petitioner

VERSUS

{respondent_name}
{respondent_address}
... Respondent(s)

WRIT PETITION UNDER ARTICLE 226 OF THE CONSTITUTION OF INDIA

TO,
THE HON'BLE CHIEF JUSTICE AND OTHER JUDGES OF THE HIGH COURT

THE PETITION OF THE PETITIONER ABOVE-NAMED

MOST RESPECTFULLY SHOWETH:

1. PARTIES AND THEIR DESCRIPTION:
[Description of parties and their addresses]

2. JURISDICTION:
{jurisdiction_ground}

3. FACTS OF THE CASE:
[Chronological narration of facts]

4. CAUSE OF ACTION:
{cause_of_action}

5. GROUNDS:
[Legal grounds]

6. PRAYER:
In the premises aforesaid, it is most respectfully prayed that this Hon'ble Court may graciously be pleased to:

{relief_sought}

AND FOR THIS ACT OF KINDNESS THE PETITIONER SHALL EVER PRAY.

PETITIONER
Through Counsel
